definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: There's danger every night on the streets of L. A.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚的洛杉礬大街上每天都是危險的。

sentences.english: It discusses Symplocos caudata as a mordant was used in Yellow dyeing and You dyeing.
sentences.chinese: 探討了山礬作爲媒染劑參與的染黃和染黝工藝。

sentences.english: Stone coal is a unique vanadium mineral resource in China and its reserve is abundant.
sentences.chinese: 石煤是我國獨特的一種礬礦資源，儲量極爲豐富。

sentences.english: In Los Angeles, he and I went to Disneyland.
sentences.chinese: 在洛杉礬，他和我經常去迪斯尼樂園。

sentences.english: There is a kali-alkaline ultramafic complex in the Fanshan of Hebei.
sentences.chinese: 礬山岩體是一環狀鹼性超鎂鐵雜巖體。

definition: Yunlong district of Xuzhou city 徐州市[Xu2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu/Yunlong county in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
ribbon (as a decoration)/cordon (diagonal belt worn as a sign of office or honor)
to crush together (in a crowd)/to make friends/to check (accounts)
to crush/to knock sb down with a vehicle
